description:
A well presented two bedroom flat arranged over the top floors of this converted Victorian house situated on a quiet residential street and a short walk to Clapham Old Town.
The flat boasts two double bedrooms with built in storage, a modern bathroom and an open plan reception room.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Killyon Road, Clapham, SW8

description: Well proportioned first floor apartment located on the ever popular Wyvil Estate. This spacious property comprises of two double bedrooms, a separate kitchen, bathroom, WC, and reception room with private balcony. Benefits include double glazing, central heating, secure entry system, and lots of storage. This property will benefit from refurbishment throughout, offering great potential. The Wyvil Estate is a quiet, well maintained estate that is conveniently located for Sainsburys supermarket, Southbank Club gym & squash club and the deli's and tapas bars of 'Little Portugal'. Located a short walk from Vauxhall Station (Victoria Line, British Rail and bus depot). Also close to the new Nine Elms Tube, Zone 1, which is due to open in 2020 - making this both a great home and a great investment. Call 020 7820 4100 to arrange a viewing now
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Wyvil Road, London SW8, SW8

description:
A spacious two double bedroom top floor period conversion, located within easy walking distance of the new Northern Line extension as well as the open spaces of Battersea Park.
This top floor apartment is set in the popular Diamond Conservation area and offers two double bedrooms, a bright and airy reception room with an open plan kitchen, bathroom, and loft space for additional storage.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Queenstown Road, Battersea, SW8

description:
Set within the Falcons gated development and moments away from Clapham Junction station, this two bedroom and two bathroom flat is contemporary in its style and extremely well presented throughout.

The property offers ample living and entertaining space and has two good sized double bedrooms.

Further benefits within the development include allocated parking, concierge service, an indoor swimming pool, sauna, gym, spa bath and communal gardens.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Harrier House, Sullivan Close, London, SW11, SW11

description:

**For Sale By Auction 21st February 2018 12:00 PM To inspect the legal documents for this property go to our website www.auctionhouselondon.co.uk.co.uk to download the legal pack**

A First Floor Two Bedroom Flat Offered With Vacant Possesion

Tenure
Leasehold. The property is held on a 99 year lease from June 2014 (thus approximately 96 years unexpired).

Location
The property is situated in the South West London area of Clapham North close to local shops and amenities. The open spaces of Heathbrook Park and Larkhall Park are also within easy reach. Transport links are provided by Wandsworth Road rail station.

Description
The property comprises a first floor two bedroom flat situated within a converted mid-terrace building arranged over ground and first floors. The property benefits from a license for alteration to extend into the loft creating an additional master bedroom.

title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Clyston Street, Clapham North, London, SW8 4TT, SW8

description:
A lovely four bedroom bedroom apartment situated just moments to the North of Battersea Park. The property is offered to the market in excellent condition throughout. There is an abundance of natural light pouring in with accommodation comprising of a spacious open kitchen reception room , two contemporary bathrooms and ample storage space. Take a moment to cross Battersea Park Road and you will find the famous Battersea Park home to beautifully well kept green spaces and excellent sports facilities. Battersea Square is only moments away offering a peaceful environment in which to unwind at a charming café or bar. Queenstown road and Battersea Park train stations are located within walking distance the property is also serviced by many buses.

title: 4 bedroom flat for sale in Landseer House, Francis Chichester Way, Battersea, London, SW11

description:
Peacefully located within this lovely development close to Clapham Junction & Wandsworth Town, this two bedroom first floor flat provides ample built in storage and well proportioned rooms.

Local road links include the A3, with links towards the South while the commuter with also find Clapham Junction station a short bus journey or walk away for National Rail and Overground links. Wandsworth Town and the Thames are also close by.

description:
This beautifully presented two bedroom, two bathroom split-level apartment with views over Wandsworth Common is situated Close to Clapham Junction and Wandsworth Town railway station.
Comprises a spacious, open-plan living room and kitchen, a large double bedroom and family bathroom with the third floor boasting a sizeable master bedroom with en-suite.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Windmill Road, Earlsfield, SW18
2 bedroom flat for sale in Caistor Road, Balham, SW12

description: Stunning large two double bedroom apartment within a small residential development. This property boasts a south facing balcony which is accessed via the living room. The living/dining area is a spacious dual aspect room allowing plenty of light into the apartment. Two good sized double bedrooms, Morden fitted kitchen and stylish décor throughout. There is easy access to two train stations (one stop to Victoria or two to Waterloo) Battersea Park and Queenstown Road. Situated minutes from the brand new Battersea Power Station Development and The Nine Elms regeneration. This apartment is great for an investor or a first time buyer.
title: 2 bedroom apartment for sale in Ascalon Street, London, SW8, SW8

description: A well presented two bedroom first floor flat that has been finished to a high standard throughout located moments from the fantastic transport links of Clapham Junction.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Comyn Road, Battersea, SW11

description:
Located just 0.6 miles from Vauxhall Station is this top floor, two bedroom apartment in a lovely brick built ex local authority block. Stockwell Station (Northern Line) is also just 0.6 miles walk from the property.

Situated nearby are popular pubs, shops, bars and restaurants as well as being a 0.5 mile stroll to the Thames River front.

A spacious lounge, separate kitchen, two double bedrooms and a modern bathroom suite and separate w/c make up the accommodation. This well presented flat would make a great home for first time buyers.

Lease Length: 110 years
Service Charge: £1,284 per annum
Ground Rent: £10 per annum
Energy Efficiency Rating: E
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Thorncroft Street Lansdowne Green SW8, SW8

description:
An opportunity to purchase a split-level 2 bedroom duplex flat within the popular Ethelburga Estate. Situated over the 7th and 8th floors providing superb views over London and located just a stones throw from Battersea Park with all its facilities and green space. The Kings Road is just a short walk over Albert Bridge.

The property would suit first time buyers, investors or someone looking for a pied-a-terre in London. The property is in average condition and offers generous square footage and sized rooms throughout.

The property consists of:

A fitted kitchen, living room approximately 18'1 x 17'5 (5.50m x 5.30m) leading onto a private balcony.
Bedroom 1 approximately 13'8 x 8'11 (4.16m x 2.72m) with built-in wardrobes.
Bedroom 2 approximately 13'8 x 8'2 (4.16m x 2.50m) with built in wardrobes.
A bathroom and a separate WC.

Leasehold property with over 100 years remaining.

Council Tax Band C: Current Price Per Year £616.89 EPC: TBC
Annual Service Charges: IRO of £750/£800

Transport:

There are excellent bus links with direct routes to Sloane Square, South Kensington, Hyde Park, Green Park, Victoria, Clapham Junction and more from Battersea Bridge Road. Trains from Clapham Junction BR out to the south of England and Gatwick Airport, as well as trains to Waterloo and Victoria with 7 minutes from Battersea Park BR and Queenstown Road BR stations.

Location:

In the area are plenty of local amenities including a CO-OP supermarket, dry cleaners, post office, restaurants and pubs. On the King's Road a short walk over Albert Bridge there are further shops, bars and restaurants.

title: 2 bedroom house for sale in Ethelburga Tower, Rosenau Road, SW11, SW11

description:
This is an extremely well-proportioned flat set over the seventh and eighth floors of this well maintained tower block on Rosenau Road.

The flat enjoys two double bedrooms, generous living space and a private balcony.

Rosenau Road is a popular road running north from Prince of Wales Drive and very close to the open spaces and varied sporting and leisure facilities of Battersea Park.

There are buses on Battersea Bridge Road that provide access north of the river to Chelsea and the West End, and south to Clapham Junction mainline station.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Ethelburga Tower, Rosenau Road, London, SW11, SW11

description: Newly refurbished two bedroom apartment situated only moments away from Clapham Junction and surrounding areas. The property comprises of two good sized double bedrooms with a large bathroom and open plan kitchen living space, there is also a stunning modern bathroom. Meticulously finished throughout this is an example of urban living at the highest quality. With views spanning London, the development itself also offers a swimming pool, concierge and privates gates giving you an added sense of security.
title: 2 bedroom flat for sale in Osprey Heights, Battersea, SW11, SW11

description:
A wonderful two bedroom first floor flat situated close to Northcote Road, Clapham Common and Clapham Junction.

Location

Comyn Road is situated just of St. John's Road close to the popular shops, bars and restaurants of Northcote Road, Lavender Hill and St John's Hill. Transport links are excellent with Clapham Junction nearby and numerous bus routes going North of the River. The open spaces of Clapham Common Wandsworth are also in close proximity.

Description

This fantastic flat is located on the first floor of a Victorian terraced house close to Clapham Junction. At the front of the flat is the open plan kitchen and reception room with a modern kitchen and a bay window making the room lovely and light. There are two bedrooms, one of has built in wardrobes and there is a contemporary shower room. The flat also benefits from lots of storage space including an airing cupboard and underfloor heating in the bathroom, kitchen and rear bedroom.

Square Footage: 525 sq ft
title: 2 bedroom apartment for sale in Comyn Road, London, SW11, SW11

description:
*** GUIDE PRICE £475,000-£500,000.****** A stylish two bedroom apartment with two communal roof terraces and well kept communal gardens. This impressive apartment offers spacious accommodation comprising of a lovely open plan kitchen reception room, a modern kitchen, a family bathroom, an en-suite shower room in the master bedroom. Carter house is situated in a quiet residential road ideally located for Wandsworth town and Clapham Junction Railway stations providing easy access to and from the City. Also close by is Battersea Park which is home to beautifully well kept green spaces and excellent sports whether it's the attractive Battersea Square or St. John's Hill with their exclusive wine bars or the popular Northcote Road with the established weekend market.

description: A rarely available apartment arranged over the second floor of a charming modern building. The light and airy accommodation is cleverly arranged to optimise the floor area and comprises a charming reception room, open plan fitted kitchen, two well-proportioned double bedrooms and modern bathroom. The green open spaces of Clapham Common and Clapham South Underground station are located within a short walk and Balham Mainline and Underground stations are within a convenient walking distance. The flat is also ideally located for all the amenities local to central Balham, Clapham South and Abbeville Village.
